extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and clinical characteristics of participating upper-limb amputees.

caption.p: Demographic and clinical characteristics of participating upper-limb amputees.

attrib.italic: M, male; F, female; R, right; L, left; AEA, above the elbow; BEA, below the elbow; RLP, residual limb pain; PLP, phantom limb pain; PLS, phantom limb sensation; Chinese version of BDI, beck depression index, 0 = Not at All to 63 = severe; Chinese version of BAI, Beck anxiety inventory, 0 = Not at All to 63 = severe.
†Residual limb pain, 0 = none to 10 = worst imaginable at time of MRI.
‡Phantom limb pain, 0 = none to 10 = worst imaginable at time of MRI.
$Phantom Limb Sensations, 0 = none to 10 = worst imaginable at time of MRI.
